original_text: And he said to his young man, “Come and let us draw near to one of these places and spend the night at Gibeah or at Ramah.”
korean_text: 또 그 종에게 이르되 우리가 기브아나 라마 중 한 곳에 가서 거기서 유숙하자 하고

sentences.original_text: And he said to his young man
“Come and let us draw near to one of these places
sentences.korean_translation: 이 여러 곳 중 한 곳에 가까이 가자

sentences.original_text: and spend the night at Gibeah or at Ramah.”
